We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced remote Manager of Data Science to oversee our data science activities. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), with experience working in a software engineering or research environment. In this role, you will be responsible for leading the data science team, working with NOAA and NASA data, and leveraging cloud environments such as AWS.Responsibilities:Lead the data science activities to develop and implement data-driven solutions.Work with NOAA and NASA data to provide insights and predictions.Design and implement machine learning models and algorithms to analyze and extract value from data.Utilize AI and ML to develop predictive models, recommendation engines, and natural language processing (NLP) solutions.Utilize AWS’ ML services such as Amazon SageMaker, Amazon Transcribe, Amazon Rekognition, Amazon Comprehend, and Amazon Lex to enhance and optimize data analysis.Ensure that all data science projects are completed within timelines and budgets.Collaborate with other departments to identify opportunities for data-driven decision-making.Monitor industry trends and provide recommendations for incorporating new technologies into data science solutions.Requirements:PhD in Computer Science, Data Science, or related field.5+ years of experience in data science or related field.Strong understanding of machine learning and artificial intelligence concepts and techniques.Experience with cloud environments, specifically working within AWS’ ML services.Strong knowledge of data analysis tools such as Python, R, SQL, and data visualization tools such as Tableau.Excellent communication and leadership skills.Ability to manage a team of data scientists and prioritize competing demands.This is an exciting opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies and make a significant impact in the field of data science.About Gama-1GAMA-1 is a rapidly growing technology business that is based in Greenbelt, Maryland. GAMA-1 Technologies provides strategic information assurance, information security, and business enterprise and networking solutions to the Federal Government. Our success is based on the utilization of industry and agency standards, establishment of standardized processes, and IT Services expertise. At GAMA-1, we believe employees should grow, achieve, and develop just as the company grows, achieves, and develops. GAMA-1 is committed to providing our employees with opportunities for career advancement throughout their employment. For more information, visit www.gama1tech.comGAMA-1 is an Equal Opportunity Employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or protected veteran status.Powered by JazzHRwJ9nHhDTLx
